column2: Find the maximum difference between any two elements in a list.
Find the minimum difference between any two elements in a list.
Sort a list of tuples by the second element in each tuple.
Find the kth smallest element in a list.
Find the kth largest element in a list.
Check if a given number is a 'happy number' (eventually reaches 1 when replaced by the sum of squares of its digits).
Generate random subsets of a given set.
Find the second largest element in a list.
Brute-force decode a Caesar cipher by trying all possible shifts.
Implement binary exponentiation to quickly calculate large powers of numbers.
Determine if a given point is inside a triangle based on its coordinates.
Calculate combinations (nCr) and permutations (nPr) of a set.
Calculate compound interest with regular intervals.
Find the nth root of a given number.
Calculate the area of a triangle given its three sides using Heron's formula.
Calculate the perimeter (circumference) of a circle given its radius.
Calculate the volume of a sphere given its radius.
Calculate the surface area of a cylinder.
Find all divisors of a given number.
Find the nth prime number.
Implement a depth-first search (DFS) algorithm for a graph.
Implement a breadth-first search (BFS) algorithm for a graph.
Create a pattern printer for various shapes such as pyramids and triangles.
Check if a string is a valid palindrome, ignoring spaces, punctuation, and case.
Implement a basic deque (double-ended queue) data structure.
Count the frequency of each word in a text file.
